article_title: Solutions sought to rising costs of inmate health care
article_text:
Fayetteville, NC (28302)

Today

Sunshine and a few clouds. High 89F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Clear to partly cloudy. Low 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: By Paige Rentz and Steve DeVane Staff writer

og.description: The corridors to the office of Dr. Wasi Haq are not bright and cheery. There are no colorful floor tiles, no peaceful landscapes lining the walls.
